SELECT PublicID , OpportunityID , CustomerID, AdviserName , AdviserOrgName , CustomerName , CustomerMobile , IntentionLevel , OpportunityStatus , OpportunitySource , CustomerRank , HSTime , TheLatestFollowUpDate , TheLatestFollowUpWay , TheLatestFollowUpContent FROM ( SELECT B.ID PublicID , A.ID OpportunityID , A.CustomerID, dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(B.SaleUserID) AdviserName , dbo.F_GetSaleGroupName(B.SaleUserID, A.ProjectID) AdviserOrgName , A.CustomerName , REPLACE(A.CustomerMobile, SUBSTRING(A.CustomerMobile, 4, 4), '****') CustomerMobile , dbo.F_DictName(A.CustomerLevel) IntentionLevel , dbo.F_GetStatusName(A.Status) OpportunityStatus , dbo.F_DictName(A.OpportunitySource) OpportunitySource , dbo.F_DictName(A.CustomerRank) CustomerRank , B.CreateTime HSTime , A.TheLatestFollowUpDate, dbo.F_DictName(A.TheLatestFollowUpWay) TheLatestFollowUpWay , A.TheLatestFollowUpContent , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ${ORDER} ) num FROM dbo.B_CustomerPublicPool B LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity A ON A.ID = B.OpportunityID AND B.IsDel = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue C ON C.ID=A.ClueID AND A.IsDel=0 WHERE A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND A.IsDel = 0 AND ISNULL(A.SaleUserID,'') = '' ${WHERE}
) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) recordCount FROM dbo.B_CustomerPublicPool B LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity A ON A.ID = B.OpportunityID AND B.IsDel = 0 WHERE A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND ISNULL(A.SaleUserID,'') = '' AND A.IsDel = 0 ${WHERE}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ASP.CreateTime) num, ASP.ID FXCBID, ASP.WXUserID, CWXU.Mobile CustomerMobile, CWXU.NickName CustomerName, CASE ASP.Category WHEN 0 THEN dbo.F_GetMediaChildName(ASQP.SID) WHEN 1 THEN '自然访客' WHEN 2 THEN '置业顾问' WHEN 3 THEN '自渠' WHEN 4 THEN '案场管理人员' WHEN 5 THEN '中介同行' WHEN 6 THEN '中介同行负责人' WHEN 7 THEN '普通用户' END SourceType, ASP.CreateTime FROM dbo.A_SharePool ASP LEFT JOIN dbo.C_WXUser CWXU ON CWXU.ID = ASP.WXUserID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareProject ASPR ON ASPR.ID = ASP.ShareProjectID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareQRCodeParameter ASQP ON ASQP.ID= ASP.ShareWXUserID AND ASQP.Category = 1 WHERE ASP.ShareProjectID = (SELECT ID FROM dbo.A_ShareProject WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID}) AND ASP.Status = 1 AND ASP.IsDel =0 ${Where} ) t WHERE t.num > ( ${PageIndex} - 1 ) * ${PageSize} AND t.num <= ${PageIndex} * ${PageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) recordCount FROM dbo.A_SharePool ASP LEFT JOIN dbo.C_WXUser CWXU ON CWXU.ID = ASP.WXUserID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareProject ASPR ON ASPR.ID = ASP.ShareProjectID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareQRCodeParameter ASQP ON ASQP.ID= ASP.ShareWXUserID AND ASQP.Category = 1 WHERE ASP.ShareProjectID = (SELECT ID FROM dbo.A_ShareProject WHERE ProjectID = #{ProjectID}) AND ASP.Status = 1 AND ASP.IsDel =0 ${Where}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.A_SharePool A LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity B ON B.CustomerMobile = A.Mobile AND B.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} WHERE A.Editor=#{UserID} AND DATEDIFF(DAY,A.EditeTime,GETDATE())=0 AND A.Status = 2 AND a.IsDel = 0 and A.ShareProjectID = (select ID from A_ShareProject where ProjectID = #{ProjectID})

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dbo.A_SharePool A LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue B ON B.Mobile = A.Mobile AND B.IntentProjectID = #{ProjectID} WHERE A.Editor=#{UserID} AND DATEDIFF(DAY,A.EditeTime,GETDATE())=0 AND A.Status = 2 AND a.IsDel = 0 and A.ShareProjectID = (select ID from A_ShareProject where ProjectID = #{ProjectID})

SELECT a.ID as PublicID, b.ID as OpportunityID, c.ID as ClueID, b.CustomerName as Name, b.CustomerMobile as Mobile, b.Status as OpportunityStatus, c.Status as ClueStatus, a.IsDel as IsDel FROM dbo.B_CustomerPublicPool a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Opportunity b ON b.ID = a.OpportunityID LEFT JOIN dbo.B_Clue c ON c.ID = a.ClueID WHERE a.ID = #{PublicID}

SELECT b.Name as OrgName, b.ID as OrgID, (CASE b.Nature WHEN 3 THEN '0E88065E-AF3E-4905-8809-7BD30610323F' WHEN 4 THEN 'DBCF76B2-BB1D-438C-B562-7A6FF3D9163A' WHEN 5 THEN '8D70D821-3BD4-46D1-8342-8B16C4BE642A' WHEN 6 THEN 'FC09F0DF-D3DF-4378-91C0-7146EC451F43' WHEN 7 THEN 'C07D5987-ACDD-40B8-9CBD-6257AA59C88C' END) as AdviserGroupID FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember a LEFT JOIN dbo.B_SalesGroup b ON b.ID = a.ReceptionGroupID WHERE a.MemberID = #{UserID} AND a.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND a.IsDel = 0 AND a.RoleID = #{RoleID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dbo.B_Clue ( ID , CustomerPotentialID , Name , LastName , FirstName , Gender , Mobile , CognitiveChannel , CognitiveChannelSub , TheLatestFollowUpDate , TheLatestFollowUpContent , TheLatestFollowUpWay , FollowupCount , IntentProjectID , IntentProjectName , CustomerLevel , CustomerRank , Remark , SourceType , ReportUserID , ReportUserName , ReportUserMobile , ReportUserOrg , RuleID , InvalidType , InvalidTime , InvalidReason , ComeOverdueTime , TradeOverdueTime , UserBehaviorID , AdviserGroupID , IsSelect , ConfirmTime , Creator , CreateTime , Editor , EditeTime , IsDel , Status , ConfirmUserId , NextFollowUpDate , ChannelUserID , ChannelTaskID , ChannelCollaborator , ReportMethod , WXUserID , IsShare , ShareLogDetailID ) SELECT ${NewClueID}, CustomerPotentialID, Name , LastName , FirstName , Gender , Mobile , NULL , NULL , GETDATE() , '公共池抢客所得' , '69331990-DBF4-0A2F-80CD-7BC424AA8928' , FollowupCount , IntentProjectID , IntentProjectName , CustomerLevel , CustomerRank , Remark , SourceType , #{UserID}, dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(#{UserID}), dbo.F_GetSaleMobile(#{UserID}), #{OrgName} , RuleID , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , UserBehaviorID , #{AdviserGroupID} , IsSelect , ConfirmTime , #{UserID} , GETDATE() , null , null , 0 , 1 , ConfirmUserId , NextFollowUpDate , ChannelUserID , ChannelTaskID , ChannelCollaborator , ReportMethod , '' , 0 , '' FROM dbo.B_Clue WHERE ID = #{ClueID}

INSERT INTO dbo.B_CustomerPotentialFollowUp ( ID , CustomerPotentialID , CustomerPotentialName , CustomerPotentialMobile , ClueID , FollwUpUserID , FollwUpUserName , FollwUpUserMobile , FollwUpType , FollwUpWay , FollowUpContent , NextFollowUpDate , IntentionLevel , OrgID , Creator , CreateTime , Editor , EditeTime , IsDel , Status , FollwUpUserRole , CustomerRank , ProjectID ) SELECT NEWID(), CustomerPotentialID, #{CustomerPotentialName}, #{CustomerPotentialMobile}, #{NewClueID}, #{UserID}, dbo.F_GetSaleUserName(#{UserID}), dbo.F_GetSaleMobile(#{UserID}), '', '', '公共客户池抢客所得', NULL, '', #{OrgID}, #{UserID}, GETDATE(), NULL, NULL, 0, 1, '48FC928F-6EB5-4735-BF2B-29B1F591A582', '', #{ProjectID} FROM dbo.B_Clue WHERE ID = #{ClueID}
mapper.select: SELECT ASP.ID FXCBID, ASP.WXUserID, CWXU.Mobile, CWXU.NickName, CWXU.Gender, ASP.ShareWXUserID, ASQP.SID MediaChildID, BMC.MediaLargeID, ASP.Category, #{SaleUserName} SaleUserName FROM dbo.A_SharePool ASP LEFT JOIN dbo.C_WXUser CWXU ON CWXU.ID = ASP.WXUserID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareProject ASPR ON ASPR.ID = ASP.ShareProjectID LEFT JOIN dbo.A_ShareQRCodeParameter ASQP ON ASQP.ID= ASP.ShareWXUserID AND ASQP.Category = 1 LEFT JOIN dbo.B_MediaChild BMC ON BMC.ID = ASQP.SID AND BMC.ProjectID = ASPR.ProjectID WHERE ASP.Status = 1 AND ASP.IsDel =0 AND EXISTS (SELECT * from dbo.F_StrToTable(#{FXCBIDs}) AS a WHERE a.name = ASP.ID)
